PluginData.Tooltip: Copy, cut and blueprint grid sections
PluginData.Description:
Allows for selecting a section of a grid, then copying, cutting, deleting or blueprinting the blocks inside it.
This is an implementation of a publicly announced Space Engineers 2 feature.
Demo video: https://youtu.be/watch?v=W0S-wIaIZ80
For more information please see the plugin's GitHub page: https://github.com/viktor-ferenczi/se-sections
